sentences.en: ...the difficulties facing women in the workplace.
sentences.cn: …妇女在工作场所中面临的困难。

sentences.en: An overcrowded workplace can be a major source of stress.
sentences.cn: 拥挤的工作空间可能是压力的主要来源.

sentences.en: And the solution to most of those workplace nightmares?
sentences.cn: 如何解决这种职场噩梦?

sentences.en: Conflict between management and workers makes for inefficiency in the workplace.
sentences.cn: 资方与工人之间的冲突使得工厂生产效率很低.

sentences.en: Don't allow a minor irritation in the workplace to mar your ambitions.
sentences.cn: 不要让工作中的一点烦心事打击了你的雄心抱负。

sentences.en: Health standard for respirable silica dust in the air of workplace.
sentences.cn: 车间空气中呼吸性矽尘卫生标准.

sentences.en: Her company ran its own workplace nursery.
sentences.cn: 她的公司开办了内部的托儿所。

sentences.en: I work in a dark workplace that has poor ventilation.
sentences.cn: 我的工作环境恶劣,漆黑而且通风不畅.

sentences.en: In the main, children are taboo in the workplace.
sentences.cn: 工作场所基本上禁止儿童进入。

sentences.en: Lack of workplace experience is not a barrier to your success.
sentences.cn: 缺乏工作经验不是你成功的障碍.

sentences.en: Management today values manner in the workplace as never before.
sentences.cn: 现今的管理越来越看重礼仪.

sentences.en: The company became a revolving-door workplace.
sentences.cn: 这家公司成了工作的中转站。

sentences.en: the introduction of new technology into the workplace
The problem of ageism in the workplace often goes unrecognized .
sentences.cn: 工作场所的年龄歧视问题常被忽视。

sentences.en: Woman have already to achieve full equality in the workplace.
sentences.cn: 妇女在工作中已经取得了完全的平等.

sentences.en: Workplace canteens are offering healthier foods than ever before.
sentences.cn: 单位餐厅以前从没供应过像现在这样健康的饭菜。

words.tran_cn: 工作；影响；受雇用（work的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: the room, building etc where you work
